resources.string: CREATE TABLE "fingerprint" ( "_id" INTEGER NOT NULL, "serverid" INTEGER, "title" TEXT(50) NOT NULL, "path" INTEGER NOT NULL, "filename" TEXT(50) NOT NULL, "fingerprint" BLOB NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE "mymodel" ( _id integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, id integer, modelname varchar , isavailable boolean , luckynumber integer, geopoint varchar, "date" date )
